name: VIC Advenger - VIC20
description:
VIC Advenger was made in one day for a GAME JAM to promote VIC 20 awareness.  It is a homage to Adventureland by Scott Adams and Space Invaders by Tomohiro Nishikado.  The game should be a very short experience (the ending can be reached in under 5 minutes).

This game is a KEYBOARD controlled text adventure made entirely in BASIC for the unexpanded VIC 20.  I recommend using a real Vic 20 or VICE emulator in NTSC mode (open the prg file in xvic.exe program).
